On Tuesday the Villanova Wildcats  mens tennis team came to town and took on the Quinnipiac Bobcats  PERIOD  The Bobcats were able to hold on to the lead and win the match by the score of  PERIOD

Tom Curran John Hughes and Garrett Lane won their singles matches PERIOD  In doubles play Brian Mikkelson and James Kwei and Curran and Joe Nuara came out victorious PERIOD

The doubles victories gave the Bobcats the doubles point PERIOD  Hughes then won his singles match at No PERIOD    to put the Bobcats up  PERIOD  However the Wildcats came back and defeated Kwei   in the No PERIOD  singles matchup making the score  PERIOD

Curran then went up for the Bobcats in the No PERIOD  singles matchup and won in three sets    PERIOD

The Bobcats clinched the victory when Lane won in the No PERIOD  matchup with scores of    putting the Bobcats up  on the day PERIOD

Charlie Feldman lost in the No PERIOD  matchup by scores of    PERIOD  Mikkelson also lost his singles matchup in the No PERIOD  singles     PERIOD

The Bobcats are on the road for their next match traveling to West Long Branch N.J PERIOD for a Thursday afternoon matchup PERIOD  They are taking on Northeast Conference foe the Monmouth Hawks PERIOD
